source_text: In the latter circumstance, should Valkea's participating interest decrease to less than 10% it will revert to a 2% Net Smelter Return (NSR) royalty, which S2 can buy back for C$1.5 million at any time.
additional_details: The royalty is payable to Valkea Resources by S2 Resources. S2 Resources has the option to buy back the royalty for C$1.5 million.
